page.title: 07GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {HIDE AND SEEK YOU NEED ABOUT 4-8 PLAYERS ONE PERSON HAS TO GO BY A TREE {OR }ANY WHERE ELSE.THEN YOU CAN TELL THE PERSON THAT IS IT TO TURN AROUND AND SOMEONE GOES WITH ANY FINGER POKE HIM OR HER IN THE BACK SOFTLY AND ASK THE PERSON WHO IS HIT TO TURN BACK AND HAVE TO ASK THEM TO GUESS WHICH FINGER WAS IT IF THEY GET IT WRONG YOU SAY TEN AND THE NEXT GO THEY GET IT RIGHT YOU SAY COUNT TO TWENTY SLOWLY THE REST OF TOU GO AND HIDE.WHEN THEY FINSH SHE OR HIM HAVE TO SEEK YOU OUT.IF HE CAN'T FIND YOU HE OR SHE HAS TO SAY{I GIVE UP}THEN EVERY ONE COMES OUT OF HIDING.IF YOU WHAT A NOTHER GO DO ALL THE GAME AGINE .BUT IF YOU FIND ALL THE PEOPLE IT IS THE FRIST PERSON TO BE FOUND HAS TO BE HIT FOR THE NEXT GAME.
